description: This file defines a multilingual team of language agents, each associated with a specific language, and demonstrates usage by asking questions in multiple languages. It sets up agents, a team, and makes sample calls to the team's print_response method.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents a language-specific agent capable of answering questions in a particular language.

classes.name: DeepSeek
classes.description: Model class for DeepSeek AI model.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: Model class for Mistral AI chat model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with routing and response capabilities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response of the team to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
